content: Grab yourself all 6 of the Buddha's Eyes in Fright Cliff and place them into the odd-looking rock near the Stone Vanguard. The result will be the emergence of Shigandang.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Secret_Bosses_in_Black_Myth_Wukong.md', within the main section titled 'Secret Bosses in Chapter 2', specifically from the subsection 'Shigandang'.
The content is as follows:
Grab yourself all 6 of the Buddha's Eyes in Fright Cliff and place them into the odd-looking rock near the Stone Vanguard. The result will be the emergence of Shigandang.
